00016 Text::Text () : content_(std::string("")), wordRates_(std::vector<WordRate>(0))
00017 {
00018     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00019     computeWordRates();
00020 };

00026 Text::Text (const std::string &content) : content_(content), wordRates_(std::vector<WordRate>(0))
00027 {
00028     // Build the appearance rate of every word in text
00029     computeWordRates();
00030 };

00038 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character, const unsigned int &position)
00039 {
00040     if(position > content_.length())
00041         content_.append(1, character);
00042     else
00043     {
00044         if (position < 0)
00045             content_.insert(0, 1, character);
00046         else
00047             content_.insert(position, 1, character);
00048     }
00049     
00050     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00051     computeWordRates();
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00058 void Text::addCharacter (const char &character)
00059 {
00060     // Call the generic 'addCharacter' function
00061     addCharacter(character, content_.length());
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00069 void Text::removeCharacter (const unsigned int &position)
00070 {
00071     if (position > content_.length())
00072         content_.erase(content_.end());
00073     else
00074     {
00075         if ( position < 0 )
00076             content_.erase(content_.begin());
00077         else
00078             content_.erase(position, 1);
00079     }
00080     
00081     // Rebuild the appearance rate of every word in text
00082     computeWordRates();
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00089 void Text::updateWordRate (const std::string &word)
00090 {
00091     // Searches the word in the vector
00092     std::vector<WordRate>::iterator wordRates;
00093     for (wordRates = wordRates_.begin(); wordRates not_eq wordRates_.end(); ++wordRates)
00094     {
00095         // Updates its appearance rate
00096         if ( (*wordRates).first == word )
00097         {
00098             (*wordRates).second++;
00099             return;
00100         }
00101     }
00102     
00103     // The word was not stored, so here we adds its first appearance
00104     wordRates_.push_back(WordRate(word, 1));
00105 };
00106 
00107 
00112 void Text::computeWordRates ()
00113 {
00114     std::vector<std::string> words; // Vector to hold our words after removing spaces
00115     
00116     // Extract the words in text
00117     tokenize(words);
00118     
00119     // Update appearance rate of every word extracted
00120     std::vector<std::string>::iterator wordsIterator;
00121     for (wordsIterator = words.begin(); wordsIterator not_eq words.end(); ++wordsIterator)
00122         updateWordRate(*wordsIterator);
00123         
00124     // This sorting will improve future lookups
00125     std::sort (wordRates_.begin(), wordRates_.end());
00126 };
00127 
00128 
00132 void Text::tokenize(std::vector<std::string>& tokens, const std::string& delimiters) const
00133 {
00134     // Skip delimiters at the beginning of text
00135     std::string::size_type lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00136     
00137     // Find the first "non-delimiter"
00138     std::string::size_type pos     = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00139     
00140     // Traverse the content until reaching its end
00141     while ( (std::string::npos not_eq pos) or (std::string::npos not_eq lastPos) )
00142     {
00143         // A word has been found, add it to the vector
00144         tokens.push_back(content_.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00145         
00146         // Skip delimiters again
00147         lastPos = content_.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00148         
00149         // Find the next "non-delimiter"
00150         pos = content_.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00151     }
00152 };
